name: CAL_REFERENCE_PAT
description: The patients and encounters referenced by the communication.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the Communication Tracking record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REF_PAT_CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category number for the context of the patient encounter which is referenced by the communication.

columns.name: REF_REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral that is referenced by the communication.

columns.name: REF_WAITING_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Waiting List that is referenced by the communication.

columns.name: REF_ADT_EVENT_ID
columns.description: ADT event in regards to which this communication was sent.

columns.name: REF_PEND_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the pending event for which this communication was sent.

columns.name: REF_CLEANING_ID
columns.description: The bed management event for which this communication was sent.

columns.name: REF_TXPORT_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the transport request for which this communication was sent.

columns.name: REF_DEPT_ID
columns.description: The department related to  the communication that was sent.

columns.name: REF_MSG_ID
columns.description: The ID number of the specific In Basket message that caused this email messages to be sent.

columns.name: REF_HLR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the logistics job record associated for this row of this patient encounter communication interaction.

columns.name: REF_TECH_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the logistics technician record for this row of this patient encounter communication interaction.
